commands.speaker: Emma
commands.line: Thank you so much for today, Ai!

commands.speaker: Kanan
commands.line: It was amazing. I'll definitely be coming back sometime!

commands.speaker: Ai
commands.line: You're welcome any time. Take care on your way home!

commands.speaker: Hanamaru
commands.line: *Sigh* I am so stuffed, zura.

commands.speaker: Nozomi
commands.line: Well, you ordered okonomiyaki on top of all the monjayaki too.

commands.speaker: Nico
commands.line: That was way too much food...

commands.speaker: Emma
commands.line: What'd you think, Kanan?

commands.speaker: Kanan
commands.line: That was so much fun! And we learned a lot from Ai, too.

commands.speaker: Nico
commands.line: Hey, guys...? I feel like we're forgetting something really important.

commands.speaker: Hanamaru
commands.line: *Gasp*

commands.speaker: Nico
commands.line: Oh, did you remember what it was?

commands.speaker: Hanamaru
commands.line: I forgot to order the mentaiko, mochi and cheese flavor, zura...

commands.speaker: Nico
commands.line: You literally JUST said you were stuffed!

commands.speaker: Nozomi
commands.line: We forgot that we all came here to help Kanan write some lyrics.

commands.speaker: Nico
commands.line: Yeah, that's it!

commands.speaker: Nozomi
commands.line: Do you think it helped?

commands.speaker: Kanan
commands.line: Um... About that...

commands.speaker: Nozomi
commands.line: Looks like you're still struggling.

commands.speaker: Kanan
commands.line: Even if trying something new does inspire new ideas, it's not really coming to me right away...

commands.speaker: Nozomi
commands.line: I suppose inspiration doesn't come easily.

commands.speaker: Emma
commands.line: But I'm sure it will be just fine! If we keep looking, we're sure to find it!

commands.speaker: Emma
commands.line: Even a rainy day like this can be the happiest ever if you let the sun in your heart shine. Then, you can take that feeling and sing about it. Like so!

commands.speaker: Emma
commands.line: *Hum*

commands.speaker: Emma
commands.line: *Giggle* C'mon, sing along with me, guys!

commands.speaker: Kanan
commands.line: Emma, you are incredible...

commands.speaker: Nico
commands.line: Don't come cryin' to me if you get sick.

commands.speaker: Nozomi
commands.line: I think it sounds fun! I'm gonna do it too.

commands.speaker: Kanan, Nico
commands.line: Huh?!

commands.speaker: Hanamaru
commands.line: Oh, then me too!

commands.speaker: Nico
commands.line: Seriously?!

commands.speaker: Nozomi
commands.line: It's not something you get to do every day.

commands.speaker: Hanamaru
commands.line: What about you, Nico? Wanna come sing with us, zura?

commands.speaker: Nico
commands.line: Just when I thought you guys had some sense in you... Ugh, fine. I GUESS I can join in.

commands.speaker: Kanan
commands.line: You too?!

commands.speaker: Emma
commands.line: Now, what about you, Kanan?

commands.speaker: Emma
commands.line: I know for a fact that your heart shines bright like the sun too.

commands.speaker: Emma
commands.line: You just have to let those feelings out in the open!

commands.speaker: Kanan
commands.line: I really can't say no to you... All right! Let's sing our hearts out!
